event.name: NEXUS_PORTAL
event.text: The coordinates you found in Sylvan's secret room lead to a seemingly unremarkable stretch of space. You detect a couple anomalous signals but your preliminary scans can't lock onto anything.

choice.text: (Anomaly Detector) Your scanners are showing all kinds of strange results.

event.text: Your advanced scanners lock onto a strange anomaly some distance away. You track it down and soon find in the atmosphere of a vast ocean planet facing a giant rift. For a few moments you can bring yourself to do nothing other than stare in awe until you snap back to reality and take notice of the even more unusual patterns of this particular rift. Its unusually stable, and if you didn't know better you'd almost say its man-made...

In the distance you can make out a ship flying towards you, and you quickly realize its Sylvan! "Ssstranger, you ssshould not be here... How did you find thisss placcce? Oh, it doesss not matter. But you mussst not ssstay here ssstranger. It isss dangerousss!"

"Thisss isss not a good time for quessstionsss, ssstranger. You mussssn't go any clossser. I wissssh I could explain ssstranger, but thisss isss very ssserious. Thissss isss my final warning. Turn back or I'll have no choiccce but to make you, sssstranger..."

choice.text: We aren't leaving until we find out what this is.

event.text: "Then I'm afraid you give me no choicccce, ssstranger..."
"Sssmart choiccce ssstranger. There'sss more important thingsss to be doing anywaysss..."
"Sssmart choiccce ssstranger. There'sss more important thingsss to be doing anywaysss..."

choice.text: Guess there was no point to coming here.

event.text: As disappointing as it is, you can't discern any reason for having come here. Guess this was just a waste of time. Or maybe there was something more that you just couldn't find...

event.name: NEXUS_PORTAL_SPARE
event.text: It seems you're on your last legs. You won't survive much longer, but Sylvan stops firing for a moment and hails you. "I don't wisssh to kill you ssstranger. Leave, and we can forget about thissss..."
Sylvan powers down his weapons for good and takes one last look at you, guilt all over his face, and slips away into the distance.
"Ssstubborn to the end, ssstranger. I sssee how it isss..."

event.name: NEXUS_PORTAL_SURRENDER
event.text: It seems Sylvan is on the brink of destruction. You aren't sure if you really want to kill him.

"It... it ssseemssss I have failed ssstranger. I could not sssave you from yourssself. Oh well... I guessss you have earned what issss on the other end of that rift. But I hope you underssstand ssstranger that... well... you probably won't make it out the other ssside. There are rulesss, ssstranger. They won't like you breaking them." With that ominous note, Sylvan simply jumps away. You notice a lot of debris left from the fight and collect what you can.

event.name: SYLVAN_CREWKILL_NEXUS
event.text: It seems as though this is the end of Sylvan, but suddenly a teleporter signal registers - you've been boarded, again? Sylvan reappears on your deck. "Sssstranger, it'ssss not sssso eassssy to get rid of me!"
As if that wasn't enough, even more Slugs beam aboard! Where are these guys coming from?

event.name: SYLVAN_DESTRUCTION_NEXUS
event.text: Sylvan falls to his knees, bleeding profusely from a gash across his face. He manages to gasp out a few final words, "Ssstranger... I hope... thissss wasss worth it...", then falls over. The Traveling Merchant is no more.

event.name: SYLVAN_DESTRUCTION_2_NEXUS
event.text: Though a strong layer of Slug sealant keeps the ship together as it begins to break, eventually it gives away under the stress and the ship explodes, scattering cargo containers across the system. You scrap the wreck first, and find a signal disruptor, some map data, and a golden laser weapon unlike any you've ever seen.
You scoop up the first cargo box, and empty out all of the scrap inside.
You open another cargo box, finding even more scrap.
You open another cargo box, finding a weapon and more supplies!
You open another cargo box, finding a drone among the supplies!
You open another cargo box, finding a ton of fuel and scrap inside.
You open another cargo box, finding a ton of missiles and scrap inside.
You open another cargo box, finding a ton of drone parts and scrap inside.
You open another cargo box, finding a brand new augment and some supplies inside!
You open another cargo box, finding even more supplies!
You open another cargo box, finding a ton of missiles!
You open another cargo box, finding a ton of drone parts!
You open another cargo box, finding even more scrap.
You open the final box and, to no surprise, you find even more scrap!

event.name: NEXUS_PORTAL_ENTER
event.text: There's only one choice left to be made here. Seems this rift is some kind of gateway, but do you really want to see whats on the other side?

As you begin to approach the rift the space around you becomes progressively more warped, and soon not even your engines are able control your ship as you're sucked at absurd speeds into the heart of the gateway...
Its a tough call, but your primary mission is too important to risk exploring ancient space anomalies.

event.name: START_NEXUS
event.text: You pull yourself off the floor of your ship and glance out the window to try and place where you are in space and time. In the distance is another massive rift leading back to where you came from, slowly shrinking. This sudden disappearance should throw the Rebellion for quite a loop.

You spin the ship around from the gateway and come face to face with an approaching vessel. On your screen appears a bespectacled Slug who looks concerningly similar to Sylvan. Their voice is incredibly monotone and they ask your purpose for being here.
"Yesss, but which one, Ssstranger? You have to be sssspecccific. There are a lot of Ssssylvanssss."

choice.text: The one that says "stranger" a lot and has a big scary ship.

event.text: The Slug lets out a sigh. "Ssstranger, do you know how little that helpsss narrow it down? That could be any one of ussss, sssave for U806, U4305, U2221, U942, U28, U7674..."

choice.text: Well, which reality are we in right now?

event.text: "Y-you... Oh dear. SSSSECURITY BREACH!" The Slug slams his tentacle down on the console and the weapons on his ship spring to life. Oh boy... looks like it's time for another fight!
"Y-you... Oh dear. SSSSECURITY BREACH!" The Slug slams his tentacle down on the console and the weapons on his ship spring to life. Oh boy... looks like it's time for another fight!

Many, many yearsss ago our leader Sssylvan Prime dissscovered thisss realm and the interconnectivitiessss of all realitiesss. With hisss help we created the largessst and mossst powerful trade allianccce in the Multiverssse, between the Sssylvansss and ONLY the Sssylvanssss."

"There are 7 rulessss that mussst never be broken. The firssst of them dictatesss that Sssylvansss, and ONLY Sylvansss, are allowed into the Nexusss. It ssseemsss your reality'sss Sssylvan hasss failed, and onccce we learn what reality you come from we'll make sssure he paysss, if you haven't already done sssomething awful to him..."

choice.text: We don't mean to cause any trouble. We can always just leave.

Well, I sssuppose you will jussst have to visssit him... but don't expect a happy outcome. In the meantime, why don't you ssstick around and buy sssome thingsss, ssstranger. I'd hate all that money you have to go to wassste."

choice.text: Then we'll have to speak with Sylvan Prime - after killing you!

event.text: "Wait, wait, Ssstranger, we can talk about thissss!" You mute Sylvan and prepare to keep on fighting.

event.name: SYLVAN_PRIME

beaconType.unvisitedTooltip: Location of Sylvan Prime, your only chance of escape.
beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: You've finally tracked down the supposed location of Sylvan Prime. You now find yourself in a concerningly empty stretch of space.

A massive cruiser approaches, similar in shape to Sylvan's transport but far larger and even better armed. You receive a hail from the vessel, revealing a lavishly dressed Sylvan, levitating in the air suspended by 2 massive rings. "Ssstranger, welcome to the center of all existence..."
"What elsssse would one expect? Hmm... you've come quite far, ssstranger. Outsssidersss rarely make it to me. Why don't you come with me, and we can dissscuss over ssssome tea."

You don't really have much of a choice here, so you accept his offer and go aboard. The levitating Slug glides over to the end of the room and gently picks up a cup and saucer, while a white triangular drone brings him a teapot. "We have all the time in the Multiverssse. I'm sssure you have ssso many quessstionsss. Pleassse, asssk me anything you wisssh, sssstranger."

event.name: SYLVAN_PRIME_QUESTIONS
event.text: Sylvan Prime sips on the tea and stares at you the way you would with an inquisitive puppy. You don't much care for it, but this is your chance to figure out who this guy is.

"Hard to sssay ssstranger, hard to sssay. I'm no sscientissst. I can tell you thisss though ssstranger. Thisss isss no reality. I'd hardly even call thisss placcce real. It'sss more of a tunnel, a big non-euclidean tunnel between all of exissstence. Right here? Thisss isss the center of that tunnel. From here you can go anywhere you can fathom, so long asss you know what you're looking for."

choice.text: Why has no one heard of this place?

event.text: "We've been very careful to ensssure word doesssn't get out. We occasssionally get Rebelssss, piratesss, renegadesss... but they never leave. They die here. It sssoundsss cruel ssstranger, I know, but you mussst underssstand. The Nexusss isss ssssomething ssso easssily weaponizzzed. To think, had I not been here firssst, what could have happened... It would be dissassstrous. It doesss not matter if it wassss the Rebels, the Federation, the Coalition, whoever. I am the only one who can enssssure the Nexussss isss never misssusssed. And it isss MY resssponssibility to eliminate any threat to our sssecurity."

choice.text: How come you've never intervened in the war?

event.text: "Our sssocciety opperatesss on 7 sssacred rulesss. You already know the firssst one, only Ssssylvansss and Obynssss are allowed into the Nexusss. But the mossst sssacred rule of all is the 7th. All Sssylvansss, regardlesss of their circumsstancessss, regardlessss of the opportunity, musssst remain neutral in all conflictssss. We sssell to all sssidesss, ssstranger. You fight your frivolous warsss, and we sssell you the toolssss to fight them with."

choice.text: What's your role in all of this?

event.text: "Had we any greater ssstake in the timeline I'd dare sssay I'd be the puppet massster, but I'm afraid it would be a lie to make sssuch a claim. We are, in esssenccce, the third party to all conflictsss. All I do is merely enssssure it ssstayss that way. Without me, the Ssssylvansss would be one of the mossst dessstructive forcesss in any reality. It would cause unimaginable chaossss. By holding an iron grip over the only sssourccce of their power I also keep the Multiverssse sssafe. No need to thank me, ssstranger."

choice.text: Can you help this can of beans?

event.text: "I uh... what? You know what, I don't wanna know sssstranger. Sssure, I'll sssolve the beansss issssue, but pleasssse don't try and explain why."
"Awww, that'sss everything ssstranger? I wasss having fun. I'm afraid however that with that tea time isss over. Now, let'sss get... ssseriousss."

"I know what you want. You have an important misssssion. But I cannot, ssssimply cannot, risssk anything. I do not care if the Rebellion or the Federation winsss in any particular reality. When a Sssylvan isss left without a home they ssssimply come here. Your missssion endsss here. At leassst you can die knowing there wassss sssimply no other way." Sylvan Prime merely shrugs, smiles, and turns off his camera. Taking just one look at his ship you realize you have no chance in hell at pulling this off. If only...

Suddenly, out of nowhere, a third ship jumps in. You recognize it immediately as Sylvan - YOUR Sylvan. He lets off a volley of projectiles which collide with Sylvan Prime's hull, instantly damaging him heavily. "Sssstranger, hold out asss long asss you can!"

event.text: You wait and hope but nothing happens. Sylvan Prime continues to approach and no one comes to your aid. Maybe, had you done things different, it wouldn't have to go this way. But here you are, all on your own. Time to fight.

event.name: SYLVAN_PRIME_DEFEAT
event.text: Sylvan Prime falls to his knees as his rings break apart and his ship explodes. "I... I don't underssstand. Ssstranger... how did you do thissss. I... I had everything. Well... I hope it wasss worth it ssstranger." And with that, Sylvan Prime is dead. The most powerful entity in all of the Multiverse, and his blood is on your hands.

Sylvan's vessel doesnt seem to have fared very well, but it's still functional. "Ssstranger, it hasss been an honor. I... I do not know what to think about thisss though. But regardlesss, my ssship will not ssserve me any longer. I want you to have it ssstranger. And ssseeing that in giving it to you I have nowhere elssse to go, well, I guesss I'll ssstick around too."

event.text: A bizzarely shaped blob of color moves towards you. It takes a few moments to recognize it as something at least vaguely similar to Sylvan. The ship hails you, and what seems to be a crudely drawn Slug with a smiley face begins to spin around in 2 dimensional space. "M A DYLAN! HELOO!!"

"Ssstranger? Where are you?" You look around the cargo bay but don't find Sylvan anywhere, just a strangely out of place can of beans. This must have been what that other sylvan was screaming about... but why? Still, Sylvan keeps shouting at you. "Come on, flip the can, ssstranger. You're not gonna regret it! The payoff isss huge!"

You flip over the can of beans, only to find two long eyestalks attached to the sides of the can. "Boom, ssstranger! Massive reveal, I'm a can of beanssss! What do you think? I turned myself into beanssss, ssstranger! What are you staring at? Sssstranger, I turned myself into beansss!"

I've really ssscrewed up here, haven't I? Ssstranger, help, sssstranger pleassse, SSSSTRANGER I'M A CAN OF BEANSSS AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH WHAT HAVE I DONE SSSSTRANGER AAAAAAAAAAHHH."
